Subject: Back With the Real Predacon Leader

Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Double Punch:





Manterror, Injector, and Bumblebee came running from bush, stopping several 
yards from Megatron and Hell Beast, who seemed to be pulling away from their 
attack on KitKat.

"Mighty Hell Beast!  It's true, you live!" Manterror yelled with a large grin.

"We wish to serve you once more!" Bumblebee yelled.

"KitKat is a fool, and will drive us into the ground and cause the Predacons 
to die at the hands of the Maximals and Alliance!" Injector yelled, getting 
down on one knee.

Double Punch stayed cloak, stopping several feet to the side of Hell Beast.  
"Mighty Hell Beast," his voice seeming to come out of nowhere, "it is good to 
see you back.  The Predacon cause has lacked leadership since your departure. 
 I'm afraid we are scattered, but with your return, we should return to 
victory again!"
